quote: La connaissance est la seule chose qui s'accroit lorsqu'on la partage.
author: Sacha Boudjema

quote: Les détails comptent, il vaut mieux attendre de les maîtriser.
author: Steeve Jobs

quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: We can't solve problems by using the same kind of thinking we used when we created them.
author: Albert Einstein
